## Singularity.exportGameBonus() method

Returns Backup save bonus availability.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
exportGameBonus(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

## Remarks

RAM cost: 0.5 GB \* 16/4/1

This function will check if there is a bonus for backing up your save.
